alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 5:59PM CDT until April 18 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Phillips County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prairie View, or 14 miles west of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management reported damaged power poles near Logan. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Prairie View around 605 PM CDT. Long Island around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Woodruff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
